title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build resilient and low-latency hybrid telecom infrastructure at scale (HMC328)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 大规模构建弹性和低延迟的混合电信基础设施 (HMC328)
abstract: Join us to discover how Liberty Latin America (LLA) built telecom infrastructure in a hybrid cloud architecture across Latin America for millions of subscribers. Learn how LLA architected a comprehensive solution using AWS Outposts, AWS Local Zones, and AWS Direct Connect to create a resilient, low-latency network with 180+ VPCs. We'll share architectural patterns that combine on-premises infrastructure with AWS edge services, BGP routing strategies, and traffic optimization techniques. Explore how to select the right mix of AWS services while maintaining security and compliance, plus gain practical approaches to capacity planning and cost optimization for telecom networks and hybrid cloud.
abstract_cn: 加入我们，了解 Liberty Latin America (LLA) 如何在拉丁美洲为数百万用户构建混合云架构的电信基础设施。了解 LLA 如何使用 AWS Outposts、AWS Local Zones 和 AWS Direct Connect 架构综合解决方案，创建具有 180 多个 VPC 的弹性低延迟网络。我们将分享结合本地基础设施与 AWS 边缘服务的架构模式、BGP 路由策略和流量优化技术。探索如何在保持安全性和合规性的同时选择正确的 AWS 服务组合，并获得电信网络和混合云容量规划和成本优化的实用方法。
